text: Tara ki tabe prthibite paribhramana kare na, tahale tara dekhate peto kemana hayechila tadera parinama yara chila edera agragami, ara tara chila edera ceye'o saktite prabala? Ara allah emana nana ye tamra theke kona-kichu eriye yete pare mahakasamandalite, ara prthibite'o naya. Nihsandeha tini hacchena sarbajnata, parama ksamatabana.
